name: elevator-key
effect: Unlocks the elevator in Lysandre Labs.
short_effect: Unlocks the elevator in Lysandre Labs.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A card key that activates the elevator
in Lysandre Labs.
It is emblazoned with Team Flare’s logo.
